category.name: Integration.Configuring CAE
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CAE_my_simulation_tools_in_toolbar
preference.preference_description: Defines the simulation tools configured to appear in CAE Manager toolbar. Valid simulation tool names can be found from the Simulation Tool Launch Configuration. In case of duplicate tool names, the complete tool name with inheritance (using "::" as separator) must be used.
